sources.title: ForeverEngland
sources.description: “A marvelous setting” “Britannia rules the waves” “A ripping yarn” (IMDB reviews quotes). A World War I action-drama of individual heroism in the Royal Navy starring John Mills. Good supporting cast and good production values. The adaptation of a story by C S Forester. Remade in 1953 as “Sailor of the King” A.K.A. “Single-Handed.” IMDB rating 6.5 Directed by Walter Forde. Released in 1935.. Complete print (UK re-release). A. K.A. “Brown on the Resolution” “Torpedo Raider” “Born to Glory”
